name: jfly
description: modern vuetifyjs-based java web UI toolkit

scripts.concat:js: mkdir -p target/classes/public/script && concat -o target/classes/public/script/deps.min.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js node_modules/vuetify/dist/vuetify.min.js
scripts.concat:js-debug: mkdir -p target/classes/public/script && concat -o target/classes/public/script/deps.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/vue/dist/vue.js node_modules/vuetify/dist/vuetify.js
scripts.build: npm run concat:css && npm run concat:js && npm run concat:js-debug

author: Matthias Fuchs
